name: 楊元森
objective: 21世紀的工程科技將人類帶領到巨量資料與高速運算的世界。即使是大規模的工程運算都被要求在短時間內完成才具有競爭力。本課程以(1)高層建築耐震設計與(2)水文分析為案例，帶領同學進入高速運算的領域，利用多核心運算與分散式運算技術，實作案例分析的高速運算，同時一探高速運算程式碼的內部技術細節。
schedule:
W01: History and impacts of high-performance computing
W02 ~ 05: Exercises of highrise building dynamic analysis
  W02: Adding N numbers using P processors (1)
  W03: Adding N numbers using P processors (2)
  W04: Impact of HPC to engineering
  W05: Matrix multiplication (1): From introduction to Hilbert matrix implementation
  W06: Matrix multiplication (2): programming and timing demonstration
W07 ~ 08: Multi-core computing for highrise building dynamic analysis
W08: Distributed computing for highrise building dynamic analysis
W09: Midterm (either close or open book, or take home) 
W11 ~ 12: Exercises of flood analysis
W13: Multi-core computing for flood analysis
W14 ~ 15: Distributed computing for flood analysis
W16 ~ 17: Final presentation discussion
W18: Final presentation
scorePolicy:
Midterm (programming) 30% +/- 5%
Proposal presentation 15% +/- 5%
Final presentation and report 40% +/- 5%
Misc. 15% +/- 5%
materials:
1. Grama, A. (Ed.). (2003). Introduction to parallel computing. Pearson Education.
2. Chopra, A. K. (2007). Dynamics of Structures. Prentice Hall.
